mapper.select: select id, `name`, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, delete_flag from article_label where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, `name`, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, delete_flag from article_label where delete_flag = 0 order by create_time

and al.`name` like concat(concat('%',#{name},'%'))
group by al.id order by al.create_time desc
